title: 820-2915 - Blue Screen
message:
Guys, 

I guess i have problem on the GPU, because sometimes  get a grey or blue screen.
I tested with ASD and passed. So, what could be the problem?

title: 820-2915 - Blue Screen
message: The usual. Replace GPU, but sourcing real new ones is hopeless at the moment.

title: 820-2915 - Blue Screen
message:
Thank You, Duke.
Could you please send the link for i try buy?

title: 820-2915 - Blue Screen
message: There are none. Even 0809000 chips are either sold out or fake, hopeless.
